FuncDef:
The active port-hqos command activates the HQoS licenses.
The undo active port-hqos command deactivates the HQoS licenses.
By default, the HQoS licenses are not activated.
CLIs: undo active port-hqos slot <slotid> card <cardid> [ port <port-list> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies a port list. The port lists can be separated using a comma (,) or hyphen (-).
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, to activate the HQoS licenses, run the active port-hqos command. To deactivate the HQoS licenses, run the undo active port-hqos command. You can configure QoS profiles, user-queue only after activating HQoS licenses.
This command takes effect only for boards in CM mode.
Prerequisites
The license file on the master main control board has been activated by running the license active command.Interface-specific scenario licenses have been activated.
Interface-specific core&aggregation scenario licenses have been activated by running the active port-core-aggregation slot card port command.Interface-specific peering scenario licenses have been activated by running the active port-peering slot card port command.
3.Interface-specific basic hardware licenses have been activated by running the active port-basic ommand.
